title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes with names like 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', and 'd'.
OB: The All types dialog displays obfuscated classes prominently.
EB: Obfuscated classes should be less prominent in the All types dialog.
SR: To address this issue, I suggest either a) sorting lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter or b) completely filtering them out.
